actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide for the designation of the 30th day of May of each year as Memorial Day, and the 11th day of November of each year as Veterans Day.

summary.text: Provides for the designation of the thirthieth day of May of each year as Memorial Day, and the eleventh day of November of each year as Veterans Day. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 6103(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide for the designation of the 30th day of May of each year as Memorial Day, and the 11th day of November of each year as Veterans Day.
